title: Geoff Culbert - Business Council of Australia
snippet: Geoff assumed the role of President of the Business Council of Australia in February 2024.

title: Geoff Culbert to lead the BCA Board - Business Council of Australia
snippet: The Business Council of Australia is pleased to announce Geoff Culbert will succeed Tim Reed as the next BCA president. Mr Culbert has considerable experience to take on the role of president, with an extensive commercial background in global ...

title: New BCA President starts today - Business Council of Australia
snippet: The Business Council of Australia welcomes incoming BCA President Geoff Culbert, who today takes over leadership of the BCA Board from outgoing President Tim Reed.
